July 1, 2007 D Brighouse March & Hymn Tune
Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
brighouse-march-hymn-tune
Brighouse, West Yorkshire Best Principal Cornet: THE LINDLEY BAND Prize: Yamaha “Xeno” Cornet Best Soloist: Euphonium UNITED CO-OP YORKSHIRE Best Soprano Cornet: Mark Wears, PENNINE BRASS Prize: The Brian Evans Memorial Trophy
Deportment & Best Road March: THE LINDLEY BAND Best Section 2: MELTHAM & MELTHAM MILLS Best Section 3: ELLAND SILVER Best Section 4: THE FRIENDLY BAND (also Best Hymn)

2nd: SELLERS INTERNATIONAL YOUTH
3rd: ELLAND SILVER YOUTH
